name: Deploy Backend (NestJS)

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: 'npm'
      - run: npm ci
      # - run: npm run lint  # Uncomment when you add linting
      # - run: npm run test:unit  # Uncomment when you add tests

  build:
    needs: test
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: 'npm'
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run build  # Builds dist folder
      - name: Verify build output
        run: |
          ls -la dist  # Debug: Check dist contents
          ls -la prisma  # Debug: Check prisma folder
      - uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: backend-build
          path: |
            dist/
            package.json
            tsconfig.build.json
            tsconfig.json
            prisma/

  deploy:
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    steps:
      - uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: backend-build
          path: build/
      - name: Verify artifact download
        run: |
          ls -la build/  # Debug: Check downloaded files
          find build/ -type f  # Debug: List all files
      - name: Create .env
        run: |
          echo "DATABASE_URL=${{ secrets.DATABASE_URL }}" >> build/.env
          echo "COOKIE_SECRET=${{ secrets.COOKIE_SECRET }}" >> build/.env
          echo "NODE_ENV=${{ secrets.NODE_ENV }}" >> build/.env
          echo "FRONTEND_URL=${{ secrets.FRONTEND_URL }}" >> build/.env
          echo "COOKIE_DOMAIN=${{ secrets.COOKIE_DOMAIN }}" >> build/.env
          echo "LIVE_FRONTEND_URL=${{ secrets.LIVE_FRONTEND_URL }}" >> build/.env
          echo "WWW_LIVE_FRONTEND_URL=${{ secrets.WWW_LIVE_FRONTEND_URL }}" >> build/.env
          echo "API_URL=${{ secrets.API_URL }}" >> build/.env
          echo "CLOUD_NAME=${{ secrets.CLOUD_NAME }}" >> build/.env
          echo "CLOUD_KEY=${{ secrets.CLOUD_KEY }}" >> build/.env
          echo "CLOUD_SECRET=${{ secrets.CLOUD_SECRET }}" >> build/.env
          echo "PAYSTACK_SECRET_KEY=${{ secrets.PAYSTACK_SECRET_KEY }}" >> build/.env
          echo "CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME=${{ secrets.CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME }}" >> build/.env
          echo "CLOUDINARY_API_KEY=${{ secrets.CLOUDINARY_API_KEY }}" >> build/.env
          echo "CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET=${{ secrets.CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET }}" >> build/.env
          echo "PORT=${{ secrets.PORT }}" >> build/.env
      - name: Set up SSH key
        run: |
          echo "${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}" > ssh_key
          chmod 600 ssh_key
      - name: Rsync dist to VPS
        run: |
          rsync -avz --delete -e "ssh -i ssh_key -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no" build/dist/ ${{ secrets.VPS_USER }}@${{ secrets.VPS_HOST }}:/var/www/html/backend/dist/ || exit 1
      - name: Rsync package.json to VPS
        run: |
          rsync -avz -e "ssh -i ssh_key -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no" build/package.json ${{ secrets.VPS_USER }}@${{ secrets.VPS_HOST }}:/var/www/html/backend/ || exit 1
      - name: Rsync tsconfig files to VPS
        run: |
          rsync -avz -e "ssh -i ssh_key -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no" build/tsconfig.build.json ${{ secrets.VPS_USER }}@${{ secrets.VPS_HOST }}:/var/www/html/backend/ || exit 1
          rsync -avz -e "ssh -i ssh_key -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no" build/tsconfig.json ${{ secrets.VPS_USER }}@${{ secrets.VPS_HOST }}:/var/www/html/backend/ || exit 1
      - name: Rsync .env to VPS
        run: |
          rsync -avz -e "ssh -i ssh_key -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no" build/.env ${{ secrets.VPS_USER }}@${{ secrets.VPS_HOST }}:/var/www/html/backend/ || exit 1
      - name: Rsync prisma to VPS
        run: |
          rsync -avz --delete -e "ssh -i ssh_key -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no" build/prisma/ ${{ secrets.VPS_USER }}@${{ secrets.VPS_HOST }}:/var/www/html/backend/prisma/ || exit 1
      - name: Clean up SSH key
        run: |
          rm -f ssh_key
      - name: Finalize deployment on VPS
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@v1.0.0
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.VPS_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.VPS_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}
          script: |
            export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin
            [ -s "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh"
            cd /var/www/html/backend
            npm install --production || exit 1
            npx prisma generate || exit 1
            npx prisma migrate deploy || exit 1
            pm2 reload backend || exit 1
            sudo systemctl reload nginx || exit 1
